trans-unit.source: Manages serialization plug-ins created, using <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" />, by manufacturers who have their own proprietary serialization formats.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia plugins de serialização criados, usando <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" />, por fabricantes que têm seus próprios formatos de serialização proprietários.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider" />.

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Somente confiáveis chamadores podem criar um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>.

trans-unit.source: The following examples show use of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Os exemplos a seguir mostram o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider> construtor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> that contains serialization information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> que contém informações de serialização para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> to which the returned object writes.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> para o qual o objeto retornado grava.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an object derived from the abstract <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> class for the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that will use the specified descriptor.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa um objeto derivado da classe abstrata <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> para o <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> especificado, que usará o descritor especificado.

trans-unit.source: An object of a class derived from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de uma classe derivada de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" />.

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted applications can call <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Somente confiáveis os aplicativos podem chamar <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A> to return a plug-in serialization writer for saving a file.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra o uso de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A> para retornar um gravador de plug-in de serialização para salvar um arquivo.

trans-unit.source: One of the parameters is null.
trans-unit.target: Um dos parâmetros é nulo.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> is specifying the wrong version.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> está especificando a versão errada.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: It is not registered.
trans-unit.target: Ele não está registrado.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The assembly file cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Não foi possível localizar o arquivo do assembly.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The assembly cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: Não foi possível carregar o assembly.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the installed plug-in serializers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção dos plug-ins serializadores instalados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> objects already registered.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> objetos já registrados.

trans-unit.source: The following examples show using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.InstalledSerializers%2A> to enumerate the plug-in serializers when saving a file.
trans-unit.target: Os exemplos a seguir mostram como usar <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.InstalledSerializers%2A> para enumerar os serializadores plug-in ao salvar um arquivo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> for the plug-in.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> para o plug-in.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to overwrite an existing registration for the same plug-in; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para substituir um registro existente para o mesmo plug-in; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Registers a serializer plug-in.
trans-unit.target: Registra um plug-in serializador.

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can use this method.
trans-unit.target: Apenas chamadores totalmente confiáveis podem usar esse método.

trans-unit.source: The method will interpret an already registered plug-in as the same one if it is the same in all these properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O método interpretará já registrado plug-in como o mesmo se ele for o mesmo em todas essas propriedades: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> é nulo.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="overwrite" /> is <see langword="false" /> and the plug-in is already registered.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="overwrite" /> é <see langword="false" /> e o plug-in já está registrado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> for the plug-in.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> para o plug-in.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a serializer plug-in from the registry.
trans-unit.target: Exclui um plug-in serializador do Registro.

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can use this method.
trans-unit.target: Apenas chamadores totalmente confiáveis podem usar esse método.

trans-unit.source: The method will interpret a registered plug-in as the same one passed to this method only if it is the same in all these properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O método irá interpretar um registrado plug-in como o mesmo um passado para este método somente se ele for o mesmo em todas essas propriedades: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> é nulo.

trans-unit.source: The plug-in is not registered.
trans-unit.target: O plug-in não está registrado.

trans-unit.source: See **Remarks**.
trans-unit.target: Consulte **Comentários**.
